column1: Human Computer Interaction MSc by Research
column3: School of Mathematics and Computer Science
column5: The MSc by Research in Human Computer Interaction allows you to undertake a year long individual programme of personally and professionally enriching research.Your human computer interaction research project will be shaped by participation in activities such as seminars, workshops, laboratory activity and field work, as well as your involvement in one of our established research groups.All postgraduate Computer Science programmes give you the transferable skills and knowledge to capitalise on employment opportunities in the burgeoning and ever-evolving technology industry.While this programme in Human Computer Interaction usually finishes after a year, it can be used to progress to the second year of a PhD degree in the appropriate circumstances.
column7: Please visit our website for the Human Computer Interaction research programme fee information.
